strings.s: OH MY GOD!!
How... How the hell do you have these????
Well... We sold a pack of weapons to some remote cocaine farmers a few days ago...
Their leader decided to show his appreciation of our service by gifting us with these pics... They worth a lot in the black market of perverts...
Looks like you had a lot of fun with him the day he took these pics, right?
Well... One of our new recruits used to work at this 'home automation' company...
Before he was fired, he stole a lot of customer's personal data files and gave this to us as proof of his hacking skills...
Looks like you and had a lot of fun the day you took these pics, right?
How can you even be trying to sell this to me?? These pictures are mine...
These are pictures of you... But they aren't yours...
You should know there are a lot of hungry eyes here watching you swing your booty around... and they might lose control if they ever see the kind of picture you like to take...
So... For the small sum of $30000 you can have these pics out of circulation and save yourself from the shame and the dangers of having them passing around the hands of our locals...
You just waited for me to spend a lot of my money before showing me this pictures, you... You jerk...
You can call me whatever you want... But you need to decide now if you want to buy it or not... It's about time to end my shift here...
These pictures were suposed to be secure in my computer! How can such a thing happen!?
Looks like security is not a strong feature of your fancy home automation system...
At least it's not like these are nude pics of you exposing yourself to some random dude...
Larry forced me to take those pictures! You remember, right!? How can he just give them away like this...
Yeah... Some men just can't keep such pictures to themselves...
And... be aware that... once nudes hit the internet, they'll never go away...
Oh my God... What should I do...
Just leave... He's trying to trick you...
You should kick his ass and take your pics back...
You should try to reason with him...
Looks like he's not with his rifle now... You should seize the opportunity to kick his ass and take your pics back...
This bastard will regret messing with me...
So... Will your boyfriend on the radio allow you to...
OUCH!!
I'm sick of your horseshit!
Fucking cunt... Let's see if you have what it takes to put me down...
_Shiiit... I can't believe I let a girl kick my ass like that..._
You'll give me my pictures back!! NOW!!
Okay... Okay... You can have them, little psycho...
Good... Now get out of my sight!
You have nice moves... I hope I'll see again you before you leave the country...
If we ever meet again, you won't walk out breathing...
We'll see...
Jesus Christ, Don't forget the big AK-47 he keeps at the airport...
I don't care... I have a mission to complete...
Delusional whore... Do you really tought you could kick my ass?
I should cut you open and spread your bowels all over this alley...
_I'm sorry, sir... Please, forgive me... Forgive me..._
I was just trying to peacefully convince you to test my new device... I was even willing to freely give the pictures after your help...
Now I'll make you go through the procedure and I'll still spread you pictures over the nastiest chan boards of the internet...
I'll be top fap material for a whole legion of incels...
Now keep your mouth shut up and bend over there... We have a lot to do...
Leave it, He's obviously trying to lure you into something nasty...
It's just underwear pics... There are lingerie ads in respected magazines spicier than these photos...
Yes... You're right... These pictures are not worth the trouble... And I almost fell for his dirty tricks...
You saved me again,
I'm sorry, sir... I'm not interested in your 'secret item' now...
Are you sure? I'm about to close the store...
Yes... I have better things to do...
Humpf... I'm leaving for now... But your boyfriend on the radio won't be able to help you forever, girl...
You should try to reason with him... You never know...
You're right... I can't just let him keep my pictures...
Please, sir... I spent most of my money on your shop already... And you're asking a ridicuous price for the pictures...
Sigh... Yet another beggar...
I just want my pictures... Please...
Look... We don't run a charity here... If you want some credit from the store, we can talk about an exchange of services...
Oh, no no no no... I already know what kind of 'services' you men are always talking about...
Don't fret, girl... I just need someone to test a new product we'll start selling to our security officers...
Oh... If... If it's something safe... then maybe I could help it... for the pictures...
Awesome... Let me show you...
This is it... I need you to test this thing for me... It's going to be the new standard tool for our security check interviews and cavity search procedures...
You already passed through a cavity search with me, right? This will be a piece of cake for an experienced girl like you...
Easy peasy, right?
This is a... This is a...
We'll still need to find a comercial name for it... Something like... The 'Security Plug'...
What... What kind of sick pervert you are...
Well... I can't deny I'm kind of fascinated with the idea of sticking stuff into girls' buttholes...
But this is mostly about our organization standard procedures...
So... You help me test the security plug... I give you the pictures... Deal?
JUST LET HIM KEEP THE PICTURES
ACCEPT THE DEAL
KICK HIS ASS AND TAKE THE PICTURES
I... need to have these pictures back... If all I need is to test this... device...
So we have a deal? Nice...
What... What should I do?
Simple... Just bend over the car here so I can install the device...
You... You are the one going to handle it!?!? I tought I could...
Hey... I need to check if the officer in duty can operate the device easily during questionings...
It's not like I never sticked anything up your ass, right? I know you can handle it pretty well...
You already agreed to do this... Don't start the whining now...
Now get in position for the test...
Yeah... I need you to arch this butt as high as you can... It's the standard position for the security plug procedure...
But... We're the in the open... in the middle of the alley... Anyone can come and...
This is my turf, girl... No one will bother us... They can only watch from far away...
I don't care... You should think about the consequences before attacking men stronger than you...
Now let's get started...
Finally... I shouldn't let you leave the airport without doing a good cavity search on you... But now I can make up for that mistake...
Nice... I've been waiting to stare this ass from up close again since the moment you left the airport...
Damn, girl... You have the most beautiful backside...
_Please... Just get it done quickly... This is so embarassing..._
Ha... I didn't know a girl that promptly allows a man to play with her ass could get so easily embarassed...
You don't have a say on this, little brat... Just be thankfull I allowed you to live...
Now... In order to start the procedure... The officer needs to put any barriers out of the way...
Whoah... Hello there...
Yeah... It's nice to see this little butthole again... We're already getting intimate, don't you think?
Just be gente... I'm actually a little curious about playing with my... anus...
Lost your tongue? Yeah... This usually happens the first time a girl exposes herself like this in public...
So you're actually nothing but a little slut in heat, huh... Shame... I like more those innocent girls that cry for help all the time...
Well... I wonder if this will make you scream or shut up...
Now... The 'Security Plug' procedure says that any obvious suspect must be 'plugged' as soon as the security check starts...
You gonna play the part of the suspect during this test... It's an easy and passive role, so just relax...
It's time to get the fun part of this this business...
Okay... A security check interview is a very stressful situation to the suspect, so... the first step is make sure she will relax her butthole...
Once the suspect is in the correct position, one of the basic techniques to relax the sphincter is some nice gluteus manipulation...
So... Can you feel your backside relaxing already?
What are you doing... This can't be a standard security procedure... What kind of operation a group like this run?
Sigh... Your response strongly suggests that you're not relaxed...
And this leads the procedure to a second sphincter relaxation technique...
Oh my God... What is...
A nice gluteus spanking is the second sphincter relaxation technique...
Please... Stop doing this...
Keep screaming like that and the entire neighborhood will come to watch... The procedure says the officer should keep the spanking until the suspect is fully prepared...
Are you relaxed yet?
No! What kind of sick mind would think that...
Are you relaxed yet?
NO!
YES (LIE)
Ha... Any girl would already said 'YES' at this point to make me stop, but not you... And there's only one reason why...
You're loving to feel my hand slapping your ass and I can keep doing it all day... just for you...
Just say 'NO' again to confirm my theory...
I knew you are a dirty girl...
Yes... yes... I'm already relaxed, sir... Just stop slapping me, please...
Good... Looks like the spanking technique really works...
Which leads to the most important step in the procedure...
Oh Lord... Oh Lord... Oh Lord...
God can't help you now, girl... But I'll be gentle with you...
Please sir... Don't do this to me... Let me go... Please...
You're going to take this up your ass, girl... Maybe it will teach you some respect...
Well... Ready or not... Here it goes...
IT WON'T FIT!! IT WON'T FIT!!
It hurts!! It hurts!! Please stop!!
Looks like you lied to me... Your butthole is not relaxed at all...
Sigh... This is not looking good... The procedure is not supposed to take so long... There can be dozens of suspects to verifiy in a real situation...
Don't try that again, please... I don't want the pictures anymore... Just don't try that again...
Hey... Easy there... We're halfway done...
I beg you, sir... Don't do that again... Anything but that...
Damn it... If I knew you'd keep whining like this... Just shut up and accept your punishment...
Well... Looks like I'll have to resort to the ultimate relaxation technique...
What!? Oh, no... Not another...
OH MY GOD!!!
This is... This is so degrading...
MMmmmnngg... I caan't understand... This feeeeels soooo...... goooood...
Damn... You came so easily on my tongue... Your boyfriend never goes down you?
No... He... I... still...
Whatever... This is about the procedure... not about your pleasure...
Damn... You came so fast when feeling my tongue... Only true sluts are so easy to please...
No... It's because I never had a...
Whatever... This is about the procedure... not about your pleasure...
'Degrading' is a strong word, girl... But we will get there eventually...
Okay... Your sphincter seems pretty relaxed and well lubricated now...
I think we can try again...
No!! Wait!!
Yeah... I can feel your asshole submiting to the invasion now...
Yes!! It works!!
How do you feel, girl?
My legs are... shaking... and I... I feel so... filled...
Amazing... Full submission... That's the expected behavior from the suspect!
I... I finished your damn testing... please, take it out now... please...
You... You already punished me, sir... Your testing is finished... Please, take it out now...
Take it out? Finished?
This was just the first stage of testing, girl...
WHAT!?
The Security Plug is also designed to track suspects and prevent them from inserting illegal items into their rectums...
But I never sticked and I'm not planning to stick anything into my butt!!!
We'll see... Pull up your panties...
While the plug is still inside me???
Of course... Come on... We can't finish the test without the last step of the procedure...
Oh my God... I can't believe this is happening...
So... You're able to walk, right?
This is extremely uncomfortable... But I... I think I can walk...
Good... It means we have a perfect fit...
Oh, man... I can almost see how it's resting inside your panties...
Why... Why would you want someone walking around with it?
Mnng... This plug gives me tingles when I move... But why would you want someone walking around with this?
Ha... Check this out... Activating tracker...
Huh?... What did you do?
This is not an ordinary toy... The Security Plug has a built-in GPS sensor that sends the suspect current location to the officer on duty...
In simple words... It allows me to track your ass... Literally!!!
Man... I wanted so much to say that joke...
But... Now that the damned thing is tested... I can take it out, right?
No way... I'll let you leave now, but I want you to keep using it for a few hours...
What!?!?
Yeah... I want to check the tracking range and the battery life...
And don't even think about taking it out... While the tracking mode is active, any detected attempt of removal triggers a big electric discharge that could stun or even kill the suspect...
So... Just strut around wearing it until the battery is depleted... After a few minutes you'll even forget that you're using it...
There can't be... nothing more humiliating than this...
Ha... Don't challenge my imagination, girl...
You can take your precious pictures now and leave...
You can kiss goodbye to these pictures... I hope it will teach you to respect the Freedom Bulls... We own your ass... Now get out of my sight...
Maybe we can still see each other later...
Can't you do anything about this... this device...
No, That man might be a psycho, but he didn't lie a single time...
I can detect a high power capacitor inside you... I mean... close to you...
It means the electric discharge threat is real... Looks like you'll gonna have to wait until it runs out of juice...
Are you okay there,
Yes... I... I can't stop now... I must keep looking for Goddess Slab...
But are you really worried about the plug? I can hear the way you moan every time you have to 'deal' with these men, You keep reaching new lows...
I... I don't know what's happening to me... I... I must keep looking for Goddess Slab...
